TextView.android:text: Privacy Policy for AviaPlanner Last Updated: February 1, 2024 This Privacy Policy describes how AviaPlanner (hereinafter referred to as "we," "our," or "our application") collects, uses, and discloses information about users (hereinafter referred to as "you" or "users") of our mobile application AviaPlanner. Collection and Use of Information We may collect various types of information when you use our application: Personal Information: We may collect information that you voluntarily provide to us, such as flight class, departure and destination countries, travel preferences, and other personal data when you use our application. Use of Collected Information We use the collected information for the following purposes: Service Provision: We use your personal information to provide you with services such as ticket price selection, recommendations, and processing requests. App Improvement: We analyze usage information to improve the functionality and performance of our application. Disclosure to Third Parties We do not disclose information to third parties. Data Security We take reasonable measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. Changes to the Privacy Policy We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy as needed. Changes take effect upon publication. Thank you for using AviaPlanner!
